categories.label: flowMeans - basic
categories.info: Controls to specify parameters of the cluster analysis

input_columns.label: variable
input_columns.info: Columns selected to perform the analysis

is_maxN_NA.label: estimate max number of clusters
is_maxN_NA.info: If TRUE, the value will be estimated automatically

input_maxN.label: max number of clusters (if above unselected)
input_maxN.info: An integer specifying the max number of clusters

is_numC_NA.label: estimate number of clusters
is_numC_NA.info: If TRUE, the value will be estimated automatically

input_numC.label: number of clusters (if above unselected)
input_numC.info: An integer specifying the number of clusters

is_MaxCovN_NA.label: use all the points for covariance
is_MaxCovN_NA.info: If TRUE, all the points will be used

input_MaxCovN.label: Max number of points for covariance (if above unselected)
input_MaxCovN.info: An integer specifying the max number of points used for calculating the covariance

is_MaxKernN_NA.label: use all the points for kernel
is_MaxKernN_NA.info: If TRUE, all the points will be used

input_MaxKernN.label: Max number of points for kernel (if above unselected)
input_MaxKernN.info: An integer specifying the max number of points used for counting the modes using kernel density estimation

categories.label: flowMeans - advanced
categories.info: Controls to specify parameters of the cluster analysis

input_iter_max.label: max number of iterations
input_iter_max.info: An integer specifying the maximum number of iterations allowed

input_nstart.label: N start
input_nstart.info: An integer specifying the number of random sets used for initialization

input_do_Mahalanobis.label: Mahalanobis
input_do_Mahalanobis.info: If TRUE, mahalanobis distance will be used. Otherwised, euclidean distance will be used

input_do_Standardize.label: Standardize
input_do_Standardize.info: If TRUE, the data will be transformed to the [0,1] interval

input_do_OrthagonalResiduals.label: Orthagonal Residuals
input_do_OrthagonalResiduals.info: If TRUE, the residuals are transformed to orthagonal distance

input_do_addNoise.label: Add Noise
input_do_addNoise.info: If TRUE, uniform noise is added to data to prevent singularity issues

input_update.label: Standardize
input_update.info: [Mahalanobis] update distance function at each merging iteration with recalculating mahalanobis distances. [Mean] update distance matrix after each merging step with averaging. [None] do not update distance matrix
